sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import style from "./comments.module.css"

const Comments = () => {
  return (
    <form method="post" className={style.wrapper}>
      <fieldset className={style.wrapper__name}>
        <label for="name" className={style.title_name}>
          Введите имя:
        </label>
        <input placeholder="Имя..." id="name" className={style.input_name}></input>
      </fieldset>
      <fieldset className={style.wrapper__message}>
        <label for="message" className={style.title_message}>
          Введите сообщение:
        </label>
        <textarea placeholder="Сообщение..." id="message" className={style.textarea_message}></textarea>
      </fieldset>
    </form>
  )
}

export default Comments
